programme.title: Sleigh Queen
programme.desc: Sole, a resilient stylist, dreams of a career boost amid holiday chaos, yearning to reign supreme.

programme.title: A True Christmas
programme.desc: Jessica's feelings for Christmas change when a series of unexpected surprises convince her to confront her past and embrace the present.

programme.title: Because Weâ€™re Done
programme.desc: Amid a mid-life crisis, a married man learns that the fate of his marriage lies not solely in his hands but hinges on his wife's ultimate decision.

programme.title: Concealment
programme.desc: A reunion unravels hidden truths, igniting a chain of passion, deceit, and mystery.

programme.title: Urban Hymn
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl with an amazing singing voice finds hope when she meets an inspiring social worker who encourages her to use her gift.

programme.title: Self-Compassion Meditations
programme.desc: Discover a transformative meditation series that nurtures self-compassion, freeing your mind and body with loving acceptance and boundless kindness. Unleash your potential!

programme.title: Sonny Rollins Saxophone Colossus
programme.desc: Explore jazz legend Sonny Rollins in "Saxophone Colossus"! This vibrant film showcases his brilliance through music and interviews, capturing his essence in a thrilling jazz journey.

programme.title: Twenty Pearls: The Story of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority
programme.desc: Unleash the power of sisterhood with Twenty Pearls. Nine trailblazing Black women at Howard University, 1908. A history-shaping decision awaits.

programme.title: In Search of the Black Knight
programme.desc: Join Director Tamarat as he humorously explores black relationships in America's modern landscape.

programme.title: Love Goals
programme.desc: Meet Kamela, a driven young black woman focused on her business, steering clear of love. Eli, her best friend is determined to play matchmaker against her wishes.

programme.title: Playas Ball
programme.desc: Meet Cedric Tinsel, the talented 27-year-old basketball star about to score a big endorsement deal and pop the question to his love, Jill Hamlin!

programme.title: DWB: Dating While Black
programme.desc: Dating While Black' hilariously explores the dating world as laid-off co-workers Eric and Alex navigate relationships, with Alex mentoring Eric on understanding women.

programme.title: A Christmas Family Secret
programme.desc: After three years of prioritizing career over family, Joan reunites with her estranged father for Christmas, but there's one more surprise.
